backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing user profiles, sessions, attendance tracking, and permission‑checked CRUD operations with simple in‑memory Maps.
backend/migration.mo: Defines old/new actor state types and a no‑op migration that returns the prior stored state unchanged.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of key frontend files describing routing, auth, scanning, dashboards, and admin pages.
frontend/DELIVERY.md: Delivery notes explaining PWA installation, Android TWA APK packaging, and build steps.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining OKLCH theme tokens and light/dark mode variables.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React app, manifest, icons, and service worker.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest specifying app metadata, theme colors, and icons.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker handling install, cache population, fetch fallback, and cache version cleanup.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the root layout, splash logic, authentication redirects, and defines public and protected routes for the app.
Guards child components so only admin users can access them, redirecting unauthorized users to an access-denied page.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthGate.ts: Ensures a user is authenticated before rendering children, redirecting unauthenticated users to the login page.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Empty placeholder component file for a profile setup dialog.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Defines the main app layout with a centered content container and bottom navigation.
frontend/src/components/layout/BottomNav: Renders a responsive bottom navigation bar with links that adapt based on whether the user is an admin.
frontend/src/components/scan/CheckInResu: Displays the result of a check‑in attempt with an icon, message, optional session name, and retry button.
frontend/src/components/scan/ManualEntry: Provides a form for manually entering a QR code fallback with submit handling.
frontend/src/components/scan/ScannerPane: Implements a camera-based QR scanner UI with start/stop controls, camera switching, and automatic scan handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, refreshing dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUser.ts: Provides hooks for fetching, saving, and checking the current user's profile and role using the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity auth context, loading stored identities and exposing login, logout, and status helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching and mutating session and attendance data through the actor API.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and theme CSS variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with Internet Identity and React Query providers.
frontend/src/pages/AccessDeniedPage.tsx: Renders an access-denied message with a prompt to return to the dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminAttendance: Allows admins to select a session and view its attendance list with date/time formatting and loading states.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminSessionsPa: Provides session management UI for admins, including session creation and listing with date/time validation.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Displays user info and navigation cards for scanning, history, and teacher admin tools.
frontend/src/pages/DeliveryNotesPage.tsx: Explains PWA installation steps and advanced APK creation instructions.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Presents the login screen using Internet Identity with basic error handling.
frontend/src/pages/RegistrationPage.tsx: Handles user registration by saving name and role before directing to the dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/ScanCheckInPage.tsx: Renders a QR and manual check-in interface, validates scanned codes, checks session timing, and performs check-in mutations.
frontend/src/pages/SplashPage.tsx: Displays the branded splash screen with logo, illustration, and loading animation.
frontend/src/pages/user/AttendanceHistor: Shows a user's attendance history with session names and formatted check-in timestamps.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters with sessionStorage fallback.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, colors, typography, container queries, and plugins.
project_state.json: Defines overall project state, including Android-app deliverable goals, architectural notes, and a list of existing features for the QR-based attendance system. Contains versioning, requirements links, and guidance for onboarding, roles, UI, PWA, and QR scanning.
